attributes.action: Award Martyn Airey an MBE or an OBE for being a thoroughly decent chap
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are asking that Martyn Airey of bournemouth is awarded an MBE or an OBE for being a great guy. martyn has done many great things in his life such as learning how to do a bulldog on his jet ski and ride out of it!!!
His contribution to the film industry is imeasurable....having rented lots of dvd's during his life.
He has strived on after losing most of his hair to baldness and has not let it dampen his passion for life.Please award him an MBE or an OBE so that he may use this to buy a newer Jag that will allow him more credibility at the tennis club.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
